content: loose ends on the wrong side if you see a small hole where the thumb was picked up sew it closed using the yarn tail steam block lightly under a wet cloth symbols □ main colour ■ contrast colour ⁄ knit 2 together \ slip 1 knit 1 pass slipped stitch over ▲ slip two stitches together as if to knit knit 1 pass slipped stitch over + make 1 stitch ∩ put this stitch on scrap yarn or stitch holder cuff chart thumb chart © 2014 marit yarn jungle main chart 2014 marit yarn jungle all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce
